meanings: [명사] death, (완곡한 표현) passing, [동사] die, (사고로) be killed, (완곡한 표현) pass away[on], (formal) depart this life, (literary) expire
관공서에서 How do I register a birth/death/marriage?

vlive.korean: [버티다 버티다 사망한 손잡이] - 많이 뜨거웠군요 - 생수 필요하시다고요? [Pot mitt couldn't survive] - It was too hot. - Do you need water? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면 챌린지③” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [Pot mitt couldn't survive] - It was too hot. - Do you need water?

vlive.korean: 오늘 안에 사망하시나요? does that mean you'll be dying today? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [루다] Welcome LUDA's Birthday Party🎉
vlive.english: does that mean you'll be dying today?

vlive.korean: 육째들 천사예요! 사망선고가 아니고! It is! Not a death sentence. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 대한민국 3대 기름 역시 참기름 들기름 그리고 윤.기.(름) (Woong's drawing time)
vlive.english: It is! Not a death sentence.

vlive.korean: 혼수상태 맛 전이 뭐지? 사망 맛? What's before the Coma flavor? Death? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 비틀즈 LoveShot♡
vlive.english: What's before the Coma flavor? Death?

vlive.korean: [내리자마자 사망한 딘딘과 자리 체인지] 벌써 죽었어요? You are dead already? 듣기 View video 핵인싸 동맹 (HACKINSSA CREW) : [핵인싸동맹] EP.18 방송최초! 게임하다 토하는 연예인 ㄹㅇ약 빨고 하는 방송
